### range xnoremap

``` sql
function! CommentLines() range
  exe a:firstline.",".a:lastline."s/^/  ##> /"
endfunction	
command! -nargs=* -range CommentLines <line1>,<line2>call CommentLines()
xnoremap <Leader>cl :call CommentLines()<CR>
```
